definition: (of garments) against the skin/to line/lining/to contrast with/to assist financially

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有纸箱都内衬塑料袋，我可以保证绝对防水。

sentences.english: We also use inserts that are made out of horsehair.
sentences.chinese: 我们还使用马毛织品作为衣服的内衬。

sentences.english: The cloth against cutting serves as the inner lining of the bag surface to form a shield against cutting.
sentences.chinese: 防割布作为包面层的内衬，形成一道防割屏障。

sentences.english: Yue Yuen relies heavily on petrochemical derivatives to produce shoe soles and linings.
sentences.chinese: 裕元严重地依靠石化原料来生产鞋底和内衬。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

sentences.english: The packing of our men’s shirts is each in a polybag, 5 dozen to a carton lined with waterproof paper and bound with two iron straps outside.
sentences.chinese: 内衬防潮纸，外打铁箍两道。

sentences.english: The gray matter lining the clefts is characterized by polymicrogyria.
sentences.chinese: 灰质内衬的脑裂是多小脑回的特征性表现。

sentences.english: Pearl outer membrane, lined with bubble film.
sentences.chinese: 外层为珠光膜，内衬为气泡膜。

sentences.english: The forepaws cover surface layers below provide comfort and lightweight liners permeability.
sentences.chinese: 下面的外层覆盖前脚掌安慰和轻质内衬的通透性。

sentences.english: Hooded jacket lined with faux fur.
sentences.chinese: 与人造毛皮内衬连帽外套。

sentences.english: Packing Paper bag lined with polyethylene film . Net weight 20kg per bag.
sentences.chinese: 包装内衬塑料薄膜的复合纸袋，净重20公斤。

sentences.english: Two fleece lined digital media pockets with weatherproof zippers.
sentences.chinese: 两个抓绒内衬与数字媒体防雨拉链口袋。

sentences.english: Traditionally, the steel pipe fittings with PTFE lining are mainly manufactured with the lap winding technique.
sentences.chinese: 内衬聚四氟乙烯管配件传统上主要采用缠绕法成型。

sentences.english: Fabric lined with a cushioned footbed for overall comfort.
sentences.chinese: 与整体舒适的气垫鞋底内衬的面料。

sentences.english: Moisture-wicking lining keeps feet dry and comfy.
sentences.chinese: 鞋内衬吸汗快干里料，使足部保持干燥舒适。

sentences.english: Body lined in 100% printed cotton sleeves lined in polyester.
sentences.chinese: 衣身内衬100%印花棉布料，袖子内衬涤纶。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
